attributes.action: Prevent the letters TH from extinction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems more and more people are omitting the above from our language. It is time we discouraged children from using words such as 'Fink' & 'Fings' instead of think & Things, etc.

The use of words like this in later life, such as in an inteview, will not serve the user well.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
